Íú±·¥õ·¥è Ä·¥ò'Íú± ·¥ã…¥·¥è·¥° ü·¥á·¥Ö…¢·¥á ·¥èÍú∞ ·¥õ ú·¥á Íú±…™·¥ç·¥ú ü·¥Ä·¥õ…™·¥è…¥ ·¥Ä…¥·¥Ö  ú…™Íú± ·¥Ä·¥õ·¥õ·¥á·¥ç·¥ò·¥õÍú± ·¥õ·¥è ·¥Ñ Ä·¥á·¥Ä·¥õ·¥á ·¥Ä…¥ …™·¥Ö·¥á·¥Ä ü ·¥°·¥è Ä ü·¥Ö  ô è …™…¥·¥Ñ·¥è Ä·¥ò·¥è Ä·¥Ä·¥õ…™…¥…¢ ·¥Ä…™Íú± …™…¥·¥õ·¥è ·¥õ ú·¥á ·¥†·¥á Ä è ·¥ò Ä·¥è…¢ Ä·¥Ä·¥ç·¥ç…™…¥…¢ ·¥èÍú∞ ·¥õ ú·¥á ·¥ò·¥è·¥Ñ·¥ã·¥á·¥õ  Ä·¥á·¥Ä ü…™·¥õ è  ú·¥Ä·¥†·¥á  Ä·¥á·¥Ä·¥Ñ ú·¥á·¥Ö ·¥õ ú·¥á…™ Ä ·¥ò·¥á·¥Ä·¥ã.** **·¥õ ú…™Íú±, …¥·¥á·¥á·¥Ö ü·¥áÍú±Íú± ·¥õ·¥è Íú±·¥Ä è, ·¥Ö…™·¥Ö …¥·¥è·¥õ ·¥°·¥è Ä·¥ã ·¥è·¥ú·¥õ ·¥°·¥á ü ü.**
**[u]  Ä·¥ú ü·¥áÍú±[/u]** 1. Obey all general forum rules. 2. This game is **Explicitly Bastard**. Welcome to the big time, friends. 3. Due to this game‚Äôs status as a bastard game, **Wisdom of the Mod** is in play. New players and known slankers will not be allowed to join for the sake of the rest of the players. 4. You ***may*** communicate with players about the game, so long as **Icibalus** and any **Spectator Machines** are included in this communication at all times. 5. You ***may*** quote and screenshot things from private messages directly into the thread, including things which were never actually said, or don't mean anything. Do this at your own risk. 6. Days will be 48 hours. Nights will be 24 hours. Unless otherwise stated. 7. Any rumours that I have taken inspiration from [color=gold]**MANTICHORA**[/color] and the other hosts of Neo Storpeo are totally baseless just because they happen to be true. [u]**·¥ç·¥á·¥Ñ ú·¥Ä…¥…™·¥ÑÍú±**[/u] - You may not self-target with abilities unless otherwise stated. - Executions will be decided by **Plurality** unless otherwise stated. - **This game is highly weird and intricate. As such, I recommend you read your classcard and any other mechanical details I give you *carefully*.** [u]**Íú±…™…¢…¥·¥ú·¥òÍú±**[/u] 1. ZoneQ11 2. Mist1422 3. Italy 4. ClonedCheese 5. Simon 6. PokemonKidRyan 7. an_gorta_pratai 8. Wazza 9. Apprentice 10. Marshal 11. Ami 12. Intensify 13. Arete 14. Centuries 15. KyoDaz 16. DatBird 16. SirDerpsALot 17. MaximusPrime 19. sulit 20. Light 21.
